tool_description: From a web page creates a customisable Social Media card which can be shared on all Social Media.
name: Tweesky
title: Tweesky

api_list.name: /status
api_list.description: Endpoint to verify API is working and available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tweesky.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tweesky.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tweesky.p.rapidapi.com/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tweesky.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
